title: Quick Tab Debug UID Settings
details:
The Quick Tab Debug UID Display feature implementation has key storage patterns:

1. Settings UI saves to storage.local with individual keys like 'quickTabShowDebugId'
2. CreateHandler must read from storage.local with individual key, NOT from nested object 'quick_tab_settings.quickTabShowDebugId'
3. storage.onChanged listener must filter by areaName === 'local' to match where settings.js saves

Files modified:
- sidebar/settings.html - checkbox in Advanced tab
- sidebar/settings.js - DEFAULT_SETTINGS, loadSettings(), gatherSettingsFromForm()
- src/features/quick-tabs/handlers/CreateHandler.js - _loadDebugIdSetting() and _setupStorageListener()

CONSTANTS.QUICK_TAB_SETTINGS_KEY ('quick_tab_settings') is NOT used for this individual setting - it's an individual key in storage.local.
